General.Name: Frigo-Pak Gida Maddeleri Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Frigo-Pak Gida Maddeleri Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. produces and sells carbonated and still drinks, fruit juices, and canned and frozen foods in Turkey. It offers apple, orange, peach, mango, apricot, pineapple, and lemon juices. The company also provides frozen fruits and vegetables; canned foods, such as citrus, plums, red kidney beans, sour and sweet cherries, and strawberries, as well as pepper products; and fruit and vegetable purees, including pastes and sauces. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Fenerbahçe Mahallesi Haci Mehmet Sok.No, Istanbul, Turkey, 34726
